QuestData.Title: Moments of Reflection
QuestData.Description:
<The crystal calls to you, resonating with sorcerous magic.
As you take hold of it, you hear the echo of a message left behind, a duty Illidan entrusted to you.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring Illidan's crystal to the people and places closest to him.

Objectives.Objective: Take Illidan's Crystal to Mount Hyjal
